thread.title: French Meadow tops MSP Airport's highest grossing vendors list
thread.title_full: French Meadow tops MSP Airport's highest grossing vendors list

author: Nick Halter
title: French Meadow tops MSP Airport's highest grossing vendors list
text: French Meadow tops MSP Airport's highest grossing vendors list Jul 23, 2015, 2:29pm CDT Industries & Tags Nick Halter Staff reporter Minneapolis / St. Paul Business Journal Nick Halter Staff reporter Minneapolis / St. Paul Business Journal Related Content NAWBO-MN French Meadow Founder and Co-owner Lynn Gordon. French Meadow does the highest sales atâ€¦ more French Meadow Bakery is the most popular food vendor at the Minneapolis-St. Paul International Airport , according to Metropolitan Airports Commission (MAC) data. MAC is getting ready to pick 15 new retailers and restaurants for openings at the airport, where 35 million passengers visit each year. As part of a request for proposals, MAC published annual revenue figured for food and beverage vendors and for stores. Here's the top five for each category using 2014 gross sales. (The full list is below this story). Food and beverage Fletchers Wharf + Dunn Bros. - $5.1 million (has since been converted into a Minnesota Wild restaurant ) Ike's food & Cocktails- $4.8 million Chili's - $4.7 million
